effect: Dash forward on a burst of air!
enhanced: Creates shockwaves that buffet foes in your path!
name: Air Burst

effect: Throw a disc of air into orbit around you!
enhanced: Throws two discs at the same time!
name: Air Spinner

effect: Rocket into the sky on an air jet before slamming into the ground to create a violent burst of wind!
enhanced: Creates smaller wind bursts that ripples forward after impact!
name: Airborne Slam

effect: Unleash a slow moving burst of air that slows and damages all nearby enemies!
enhanced: Twister stops shortly after being unleashed but continues to spin in place!
name: Breaking Twister

effect: Hurl a rapidly revolving air current that returns to you!
enhanced: Creates an additional boomerang before returning to you!
name: Cyclone Boomerang

effect: Summon a dragon formed of wind to draw in enemies before blasting them away!
enhanced: Increases the blast area!
name: Dragon Blast

effect: Summon a current of air that causes all incoming attacks to miss while you are moving or using basic arcana!
enhanced: Increases movement speed and allows you to run over pits!
name: Evading Zephyr

effect: Hold to charge up and release a stormy ball of wind that implodes at maximum charge!
enhanced: Charges up twice as quickly!
name: Furious Tempest

effect: Dash forward with such force that enemies in the area are pulled into your wake!
enhanced: Creates a secondary burst on landing!
name: Gust Burst

effect: Release a volley of piercing winds in a cone!
enhanced: Fires additional projectiles!
name: Gust Volley

effect: Designed by Virtuoso Michael Belloy, this arcana allows you to seize a foe and leap high into the air before crashing down!
enhanced: Increases the distance at which you can grab foes!
name: Heroic Leap

effect: Fire off a series of sound waves that stun any enemies they strike!
enhanced: Increases the distance traveled!
name: Mach Stunner

effect: Designed by Virtuoso Claire Astrid, this arcana allows you to confuse foes around you, causing them to attack each other!
enhanced: Increases the confusion duration!
name: Mentis Imperium

effect: Fly forward with a ring of tumbling winds that locks onto the first enemy struck!
enhanced: Increases the tumbling duration!
name: Rushing Typhoon

effect: Designed by Virtuoso Sean 'Ariamaki' Riedinger, this arcana allows you to lower active cooldowns and steal speed from enemies by blasting them with a burst of air!
enhanced: Increases the cooldown reduction!
name: Scales of Babylon

effect: Rush forward while unleashing a flurry of wind slashes!
enhanced: Slashes are larger and more numerous!
name: Shearing Chain

effect: Draw in foes with a ring of tumbling winds before striking them away!
enhanced: Increases tumble duration and final blow knocks foes further away!
name: Spiraling Typhoon

effect: Release a burst of air that drafts foes and stuns them against walls!
enhanced: Destroys all enemy projectiles!
name: Storm Draft

effect: Rapidly spin forward and pull nearby enemies into your wake!
enhanced: Move and spin even faster, dealing more damage!
name: Tearing Whirlwind

effect: Summon a ward of air that slows enemies and increases all air damage done in the area!
enhanced: Ward area is increased and also increases fire damage done in the area!
name: Ward of Winds

effect: Unleash a protective vortex of fierce winds!
enhanced: Whirling duration increased!
name: Whirling Tornado

effect: Conjure an agent of wind that buffets foes with whirling winds!
enhanced: Agents move and attack more quickly!
name: Whirling Wind Agent

effect: Unleash a quick salvo of cutting winds!
enhanced: Projectiles pierce enemies but attack range is lowered!
name: Wind Flurry

effect: Summon arcs of slashing wind!
enhanced: Final slash creates a piercing wind that negates projectiles!
name: Wind Slash

effect: Throws out an orb of primal chaos that erases the first enemy hit from existence! Enemies that cannot be erased will take heavy damage instead.
enhanced: Not available
name: Absolute Finale

effect: Designed by Virtuoso Kaleb Daugherty, this arcana allows you teleport all nearby enemies into a chaos storm!
enhanced: Not available
name: Arcane Intervention

effect: Create a chaotic rift to strike foes before compressing it and firing it forward!
enhanced: Not available
name: Chaos Crusher

effect: Dash through a rift torn open by primal chaos!
enhanced: Not available
name: Chaotic Rift

effect: Summon a beam of chaos energy!
enhanced: Not available
name: Distortion Beam

effect: Designed by Virtuoso Nathan 'MortisXII' Cannell, this arcana allows you to impale all enemies in a line with a spear of chaos and drag them to you!
enhanced: Not available
name: Mortal Coil

effect: Throw out a cluster of chaos orbs that explode on landing!
enhanced: Not available
name: Null Parade

effect: Summon a legion of Chaos Knights that rush forth and attack enemies!
enhanced: Not available
name: Phantom Brigade

effect: Shield incoming attacks as you charge forward, stunning enemies in your path!
enhanced: Increases the durability, damage, and speed of your aegis!
name: Aegis Charge

effect: Summon a tunneling dragon that drives away foes!
enhanced: Summons dual dragons that travel further!
name: Dragon Dive

effect: Pummel foes with gigantic earth fists!
enhanced: Becomes a single hit arcana with an even bigger fist!
name: Earth Knuckles

effect: Conjure an agent of earth that crushes foes!
enhanced: Agent has a double stomp!
name: Earth Stomp Agent

effect: Form a protective ring of stone shields!
enhanced: Summons additional shields!
name: Earthen Aegis

effect: Hurl a giant stone axe into the air that crashes down on enemies!
enhanced: Increases damage and crash area of axes!
name: Earthquake Axe

effect: Cultivate a row of entwining vines that roots foes!
enhanced: Vines poison any foes they root!
name: Embracing Vines

effect: Mark foes with a series of rocky strikes that explode as you leap back!
enhanced: Adds an extra strike to the rhythm!
name: Fadeaway Rhythm

effect: Designed by Virtuoso Laurent Sweert, this arcana allows you to grasp all foes in the area with giant stone fists!
enhanced: Starts off at max radius and crushes enemies more quickly!
name: Grasping Earth

effect: Hurl a boulder that stuns foes!
enhanced: Boulder explodes on impact and damages nearby foes!
name: Knockout Boulder

effect: Generates a magnetic aura that causes basic arcana to hurl stone projectiles!
enhanced: Instantly summons a ring of stones that briefly stuns enemies they strike!
name: Magnetic Follow-up

effect: Unleash a cascade of obsidian daggers!
enhanced: Daggers deal more damage and stun enemies!
name: Obsidian Cascade

effect: Rupture the earth with rapidly tunneling vines to continually damage enemies in a line!
enhanced: Increases rippling duration and distance covered by vines!
name: Rippling Rupture

effect: Summon a pair of rocky buzzsaws that tear forward!
enhanced: Summons an additional buzzsaw!
name: Rock n' Roll

effect: Launch into the air and crash down on all nearby foes to stun them!
enhanced: Launches even higher and summons rippling earth waves on landing!
name: Seismic Entry

effect: Strike a boulder to shatter it into a ring of shrapnel!
enhanced: Creates additional shrapnel!
name: Shattering Strike

effect: Tear forward and leave behind a trail of earthen spikes!
enhanced: Spikes continue to form even after dash is complete!
name: Spike Track

effect: Designed by Virtuosos Shamrock63 and Slamuel, this arcana allows you to form a quartet of chess knights that leap to your defense!
enhanced: Knights jump in place for a secondary shock after their initial leap!
name: Stalwart Defenders

effect: Rapidly fire stones!
enhanced: Reduces damage but shoots two stones at a time!
name: Stone Shot

effect: Drive forward and rock enemies with a giant drill made of stone!
enhanced: Adds an additional drill charge!
name: Tectonic Drill

effect: Pulverize the ground to summon cascading rings of earth spikes!
enhanced: Summons all rings simultaneously but deals less damage overall!
name: Terra Ring

effect: Hurl bolas made of toxic vines to entangle and poison foes!
enhanced: Bolas no longer stop upon hitting a foe!
name: Toxic Bolas

effect: Tear forward while throwing behind a toxic bomb that poisons foes!
enhanced: Throw an extra toxic bomb forward!
name: Toxic Trap

effect: Form a ward of earth that periodically stuns foes and increases all earth damage done in the area!
enhanced: Ward area is increased and also increases air damage done in the area!
name: Ward of Stones

effect: Dash forward and pummel a foe with barrage of fiery punches!
enhanced: Increases punch count!
name: Blazing Blitz

effect: Spin forward while swinging a blazing whip of flames!
enhanced: Increases flame radius!
name: Blazing Lariat

effect: Dash forward, grabbing all enemies in your path before unleashing an onslaught of fireballs!
enhanced: Increases fireball count!
name: Blazing Onslaught

effect: Blast into the air and come crashing down into a fiery explosion!
enhanced: Start the vault with an explosive bang!
name: Blazing Vault

effect: Fling bouncing balls of fire!
enhanced: Fireballs pass through enemies!
name: Bouncing Blaze

effect: Call down a meteor from the skies!
enhanced: Meteors crash down much quicker!
name: Crashing Meteor

effect: Summon a torrent of fiery dragons!
enhanced: Fires two dragons simultaneously and increases number of charges!
name: Dragon Arc

effect: Fire a massive fireball that explodes on impact!
enhanced: Increases the blast radius!
name: Exploding Fireball

effect: Charge through enemies, marking them with a timed explosive!
enhanced: Explosions burn enemies!
name: Explosive Charge

effect: Ignite the ground to create a blazing trail of flames!
enhanced: Wall forms quicker and extends further!
name: Fire Wall

effect: Blast away enemies with a breath of fire!
enhanced: Ignites all enemies it hits!
name: Flame Breath

effect: Carve out a wave of flames that ignites all enemies in its path!
enhanced: Cleave with both hands to create a wider wave that travels further!
name: Flame Cleaver

effect: Fire off a fireball, followed by a flaming arrow that can be fused to release a burst of arrows!
enhanced: Fusion releases even more arrows!
name: Flame Fusion

effect: Blast enemies away with plumes of flames!
enhanced: Executes quicker and affects a larger area!
name: Flame Strike

effect: Rush forward and conjure a volley of accompanying flares!
enhanced: Summons additional flares!
name: Flare Rush

effect: Enter a burning rage that speeds up basic arcana!
enhanced: Explodes when activated to burn foes in the area!
name: Fuelled Berserk

effect: Ignite a halo of flares that home in on the nearest foe!
enhanced: Summons additional flares and increases duration!
name: Homing Flares

effect: Blast enemies away with a chain of explosions!
enhanced: Final explosion ignites the area on fire!
name: Ignition Drive

effect: Hold to charge up and release an expanding ball of fire that explodes at maximum charge!
enhanced: Charges up twice as quickly!
name: Raging Inferno

effect: Conjure an agent of fire that engages foes with a rapid barrage of fireballs!
enhanced: Agents attack more often but deals less damage!
name: Rapid Fire Agent

effect: Blast away enemies around you with a burning halo of flames!
enhanced: Flames last longer, dealing more damage!
name: Searing Crown

effect: Rush forward and leave flames in your wake!
enhanced: Adds an explosion on landing that burns foes!
name: Searing Rush

effect: Fire off a volley of arcing tracers that return to you!
enhanced: Tracers are larger and more numerous!
name: Tracer Barrage

effect: Form a ward of fire that damages enemies and increases all fire damage done in the area!
enhanced: Ward area is increased and also increases water damage done in the area!
name: Ward of Flames

effect: Generate a stationary sphere of arcing current!
enhanced: Sphere is larger and has a longer duration!
name: Arc Sphere

effect: Hold to charge up and release a devastating ball of lightning that shocks at maximum charge!
enhanced: Charges up twice as quickly!
name: Ball Lightning

effect: Release a charged orb that can be detonated to strike all nearby foes with lightning!
enhanced: Greatly increases the orb's maximum area of effect!
name: Bolt Claymore

effect: Direct a short stream of lightning!
enhanced: Final burst is larger and shocks foes!
name: Bolt Rail

effect: Conjure a spear of lightning that bounces between enemies!
enhanced: Spear bounces more times and shocks for a longer duration!
name: Bouncing Surge

effect: Jolt ahead, leaving behind electric orbs that are chained together after a short delay!
enhanced: Lightning chains deal additional damage!
name: Circuit Line

effect: Send out an electric orb that fires a continuous lightning stream at the first enemy it strikes!
enhanced: Lightning stream pushes enemies back twice as far!
name: Deferred Dynamo

effect: Generate a charged orb that syncs up with nearby orbs before releasing a stream of lightning!
enhanced: Orbs fire both forwards and backwards!
name: Ion Spike

effect: Generate a field of electricity that shocks enemies that you come into contact with!
enhanced: Creates shocking pulses!
name: Lightning Aspect

effect: Conjure an agent of lightning that assaults foes with a stream of lightning!
enhanced: Lightning streams last longer and deal more damage!
name: Line Shock Agent

effect: Designed by Virtuoso David Gottsegen, this arcana allows you to pull all nearby projectiles into an orbit around you!
enhanced: All projectiles shock foes!
name: Magsphere

effect: Ride a bolt of lightning to shock foes in the area!
enhanced: Increases the number of strikes!
name: Shock Assault

effect: Jolt ahead and leave behind a line of shocking current!
enhanced: Throws an additional shock line in front you!
name: Shock Line

effect: Hold to charge up and release an explosion of electricity that shocks all foes in the area at maximum charge!
enhanced: Nova charges up faster and has an increased radius!
name: Shock Nova

effect: Throw out a wire of current that shocks any enemies that it comes into contact with!
enhanced: Wire is longer and expands more quickly!
name: Shock Wire

effect: Form a double weave of shocking sparks that slowly move outward!
enhanced: Sparks fire a lightning stream back to you when they dissipate!
name: Spark Array

effect: Jolt foes with a burst of electricity!
enhanced: Final blow creates a shocking electric blast!
name: Spark Contact

effect: Hurl an electrified star that shocks any enemy it strikes!
enhanced: Stars shock for a longer duration!
name: Star Bolt

effect: Throws out an anchor that generates a surge of lightning between you and the anchor!
enhanced: Anchor lasts longer and creates more streams!
name: Surge Anchor

effect: Volt into the sky before crashing down on a bolt of lightning to shock all foes in the area!
enhanced: Creates a secondary aftershock!
name: Thunder Drop

effect: Generate a series of lightning strikes that shock foes!
enhanced: All strikes generate near simultaneously!
name: Thundering Chain

effect: Generate a protective ring of charged orbs that ricochet from foe to foe!
enhanced: Pinballs last longer and have more ricochet charges!
name: Volt Pinball

effect: Dart forward and pin all foes in your path with a piercing lightning needle!
enhanced: Dart forward quicker with a more powerful needle!
name: Voltaic Needle

effect: Summon a lightning ward that shocks foes randomly and increases all lightning damage done in the area!
enhanced: Ward area is increased and also increases earth damage done in the area!
name: Ward of Lightning

effect: Direct an arcing stream of water!
enhanced: Unleashes a burst of ice on impact!
name: Aqua Arc

effect: Unleash a torrent of water to blast away enemies!
enhanced: Beam's width is increased!
name: Aqua Beam

effect: Hold to charge up and release a rapidly spinning ball of water that creates an explosive deluge at maximum charge!
enhanced: Charges up twice as quickly!
name: Aqua Breaker

effect: Summon swirling currents of water that envelop you!
enhanced: Unleashes a final burst of freezing ice!
name: Aqua Vortex

effect: Throw out a burst of water that draws in foes before blasting into the sky and splashing down!
enhanced: Splashdown creates additional water bursts!
name: Binary Splashdown

effect: Throw out a bubble of water that bounces every time it strikes an enemy or wall!
enhanced: Increases bubble speed and number of times it can strike enemies!
name: Bouncing Bubble

effect: Rapidly fire a stream of explosive bubbles!
enhanced: Bubbles are larger and deal more damage!
name: Bubble Barrage

effect: Conjure a rapidly revolving ring of icy blades!
enhanced: Conjures additional blades and all blades fly outward when released!
name: Cardice Prime

effect: Designed by Virtuoso Verdestrom, this arcana creates a tendril of water that binds and travels to any foes it hits!
enhanced: Tendrils spin faster and deal more damage!
name: Creeping Tendrils

effect: Throw out a fan of frost daggers that freeze enemies!
enhanced: Daggers fly further and pierce through enemies!
name: Frost Fan

effect: Race forward while leaving behind a frozen decoy!
enhanced: Leaves an extra decoy at the end of the dash!
name: Frost Feint

effect: Lob a frozen decoy that lures in foes and giant sharks alike!
enhanced: Lures a larger shark for increased damage!
name: Frozen Bait

effect: Dash forward and conjure a colossal frozen fist to strike foes!
enhanced: Fist explodes and fires off a cone of ice shards!
name: Glacial Cross

effect: Pierce foes with conjured ice daggers!
enhanced: Throws out a piercing dagger on the final strike!
name: Ice Dagger

effect: Summon a trio of seekers that home in on and freeze nearby enemies!
enhanced: Summons an additional seeker!
name: Ice Seekers

effect: Conjure a spear of ice that impales foes and freezes them against walls!
enhanced: Spear is larger, moves faster, and deals more damage!
name: Ice Spear

effect: Summon a storm of hail and ice shards that rains down on foes!
enhanced: Increases storm size and duration!
name: Perfect Storm

effect: Conjure a series of icicles that cascade out and return to you!
enhanced: Icicles travel further!
name: Rebounding Icicles

effect: Conjure snowflake chakrams that orbit outwards!
enhanced: Chakrams orbit back inwards after expanding!
name: Snowflake Chakrams

effect: Pull in enemies with a series of water balls before blasting them away with a massive deluge!
enhanced: Summons an additional water ball to shield you while casting!
name: Tidal Blast

effect: Form a ward of frost that periodically freezes foes and increases all water damage done in the area!
enhanced: Ward area is increased and also increases lightning damage done in the area!
name: Ward of Frost

effect: Fire off a prison of water that envelops the first enemy it strikes!
enhanced: Gain an extra prison charge and increases the prison's speed!
name: Water Prison

effect: Conjure an agent of water that douses foes with a spread of water blobs!
enhanced: Adds more water blobs for a wider spread shot!
name: Water Pulse Agent

effect: Race forward while enveloped in a watery globe that briefly shields you!
enhanced: Increases shield durability!
name: Wave Front
